items.sentence: Let's stay out of the water until the lifeguard goes on duty.

Being happy with the little things is an art that few master.
The last time that Tom tried to hug Mary, she got mad at him.
When we sleep, our body temperature drops by several degrees.
Tom has decided to buy the house that he looked at last week.
We planned to buy three of those, but they only had one left.

If you behave like a lackey, you'll be treated like a lackey.
If it's OK for Tom to buy a knife, then why on earth can't I?
